sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Fluxbox package contains fluxbox, bsetbg and bsetroot.

sect3.title: fluxbox
sect3.para: fluxbox is a window manager for X11 based on Blackbox 0.61.0.

sect3.title: bsetbg
sect3.para: bsetbg is a utility that sets the background image. It needs display, Esetroot, wmsetbg, xv, qiv or xsri to be used.

sect3.title: bsetroot
sect3.para: bsetroot is a Blackbox utility to change root window appearance.
